data.name: EmailValidationBodyFormat
data.value:
This is an automatically generated email from the High Priority Chemicals Data System (HPCDS).

Please confirm your HPCDS account by clicking the following link: {0}

If clicking this link does not work, try copying and pasting the URL into the address bar of your web browser.

If you need help, please contact the HPCDS application administrator, Topher Buck, at 617-367-8558 x309 or tbuck@newmoa.org

Please do not respond to this email.

data.name: RegistrationApprovalReqForAdminBodyFormat
data.value:
This is an automatically generated email from the High Priority Chemicals Data System (HPCDS).

A new user has created an HPCDS account for an organization with no other users: {0} for {1}.

To approve this user, please click on the Approve New User Link. Once approved, the new user will receive an email with login instructions and no further action is required on your part.

If the Approve New User Link above does not work, try copying and pasting the following URL into the address bar of your web browser: {2}?email={0}&code={3}

If you need help, please contact the HPCDS application administrator, Topher Buck, at 617-367-8558 x309 or tbuck@newmoa.org

Please do not respond to this email.
data.comment: Registration: Approval Requested for New User and New Org (Email Body) - HPCDS-22

data.name: RegistrationApprovalReqForAdminSubjectFormat
data.value: HPCDS new user account for new organization
data.comment: Registration: Approval Requested for New User and New Org (Email Subject) - HPCDS-22

data.name: RegistrationApprovalReqForOrgUsersBodyFormat
data.value:
This is an automatically generated email from the High Priority Chemicals Data System (HPCDS).

A new user has created an HPCDS account and requested to join your organization: {0}.

To approve this user, please click on the Approve New User Link. Once approved, the new user will receive an email with login instructions and no further action is required on your part.

If you believe you received this message in error, simply delete this email.

If the Approve New User Link above does not work, try copying and pasting the following URL into the address bar of your web browser: {2}?email={0}&code={3}

If you need help, contact the HPCDS application administrator, Topher Buck, at 617-367-8558 x309 or tbuck@newmoa.org.

Please do not respond to this email.
data.comment: Registration: Approval Requested for New User to Active Org (Email Body) - HPCDS-22

data.name: RegistrationApprovalReqForOrgUsersSubjectFormat
data.value: HPCDS new user account for your organization
data.comment: Registration: Approval Requested for New User to Active Org (Email Subject) - HPCDS-22

data.name: ResetPWD_NotRegisterdUserBodyFormat
data.value:
This is an automatically generated e-mail from the High Priority Chemicals Data System (HPCDS).


You have requested an HPCDS account password reset; however, the HPCDS does not contain an account associated with this email address. You may create an account at https:\\hpcds.theic2.org.

If you need help, please contact the HPCDS application administrator, Topher Buck, at 617-367-8558 x309 or tbuck@newmoa.org

Please do not respond to this email.

data.name: ResetPWD_NotVerifiedUserBodyFormat
data.value:
This is an automatically generated email from the High Priority Chemicals Data System (HPCDS).

Our records show that you have not validated your email address. Please validate your email address by clicking on the following link: {0}

If clicking the link above does not work, try copying and pasting the URL into the address bar of your web browser.

After validating your email address, return to the Login Page: {1} and click on Forgot your password? to reset your password.

If you need help, please contact the HPCDS application administrator, Topher Buck, at 617-367-8558 x309 or tbuck@newmoa.org

Please do not respond to this email.

data.name: ResetPWD_RegisterdUserBodyFormat
data.value:
This is an automatically generated email from the High Priority Chemicals Data System (HPCDS).

You have requested a password reset for your HPCDS account. Please click the following link and follow the instructions provided to reset your password: {0}

If clicking this link does not work, try copying and pasting the URL into the address bar of your web browser.

If you need help, please contact the HPCDS application administrator, Topher Buck, at 617-367-8558 x309 or tbuck@newmoa.org

Please do not respond to this email.
